name: Protector
tooltip: Designates this fighter as a Protector, increasing its max health by 650 and giving it Protection Aura.<br><br><span style='color: #ff8800'>Protection Aura:</span> Nearby allies in a large area have 0.8% missing health regeneration while the Protector is alive
